home.title: A NEW WAY TO SURVIVE OUTSIDE
home.subtitle: Be prepared for any situation with our premium survival kits.

about.title: About SurviveWell
about.description: SurviveWell is dedicated to helping you prepare for the unexpected. Our mission is to provide high-quality survival kits and expert advice to ensure you and your loved ones are ready for any situation.

protection.title: Protection
protection.description: Our carefully curated survival kits offer comprehensive protection against various emergencies.

familyFocused.title: Family-Focused
familyFocused.description: We understand the importance of keeping your entire family safe and prepared.

quickResponse.title: Quick Response
quickResponse.description: Our kits are designed for easy access and use, ensuring a swift response in critical situations.
